1370: Jacobus was born in Paternoster straetje in 1370.
1387: Jacobus moved to Die Coninc straet.A.4 after marriage.
Got married to Salome at age 18 in 1387.
1378: Lost sibling Heinhocа in 1378 when Heinhocа was 1.
1382: Lost sibling Gherbaren in 1382 when Gherbaren was 10.
1390: Lost mother at the age of 20 in childbirth.
Had a son with Salome, Trove, at age 20.
Lost son Haghen when Haghen was 2 years old.
1397: Lost his wife Salome while she was giving birth to Trove in 1397.
Got married a second time to Oda at age 28 in 1397.
1388: Had a son with Salome, Ever, at age 18.
1389: Had a son with Salome, Haghen, at age 19.
1391: Had a son with Salome, Assceric, at age 21.
1393: Had a daughter with Salome, Nimme, at age 23.
1394: Had a son with Salome, Mewekinus, at age 24.
Lost daughter Nimme when Nimme was 2 years old.
1395: Had a daughter with Salome, Jute, at age 25.
1396: Lost son Mewekinus when Mewekinus was 3 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
